content.raw:
the instruction before this line states: 

~~~
To install the prerelease, first use the instructions in the install_ubuntu tutorial to install the stable repository and after it add the prerelease repository
~~~

does that mean the comment is actually correct and the users need to add both the stable and prerelease repositories?
